mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, category_id, price, status, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{status}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: SELECT d.*, c.name as categoryName FROM dish d LEFT JOIN category c ON d.category_id = c.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
